describe: Lithuania is a country in the Baltic region of Europe, known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and beautiful landscapes. It is one of the three Baltic states and has a diverse heritage influenced by various cultures over the centuries.

cities.name: ğŸ™ Vilnius
cities.geographical_location: Located in the southeastern part of Lithuania, Vilnius is the capital and largest city.
cities.climate: Vilnius has a humid continental climate with cold winters and warm summers.

cities.geographical_location: Situated in the south-central part of Lithuania, Kaunas is the second-largest city.
cities.climate: Kaunas experiences a humid continental climate with distinct seasons.

cities.geographical_location: Located on the western coast of Lithuania, KlaipÄ—da is a port city by the Baltic Sea.
cities.climate: KlaipÄ—da has an oceanic climate with mild, wet winters and cool summers.
cities.famous_cuisine: Fish dishes, especially smoked fish, and Juoda Duona (black bread).
